most_active_tickets.title: UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
Workstream activity can't update last week tasks

common_issues.title: Performance Issues in Pieces OS and VS Code Extension
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing slow performance and high resource usage in Pieces OS, particularly within the VS Code extension after sending multiple messages to Pieces Copilot.  One user on Windows (OS version 12.0.0) and another on macOS (OS version 4.2.1) reported similar performance degradation.  The VS Code user encountered slow UI response, keyboard input lag, and delayed LLM responses. The macOS user couldn't update last week's activities. Further investigation is needed to determine the root cause and potential solutions.

related_issues.title: UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
related_issues.text:
UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, VS Code, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After sending several messages to Pieces Copilot in the extension for VS Code, there is a significant performance drop to the program which leads to the app eventually becoming extremely slow and difficult to use when pressing buttons, using keyboard input, and the speed of which a LLM responds. CPU usage and RAM usage also spikes when this occurs.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Workstream activity can't update last week tasks
related_issues.text:
Workstream activity can't update last week tasks
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I opened #753.
Now, Today's workstream is being updated but still I can't update last week activities with refresh button(select last week)

Is it good to think I can't revive last week tasks or I will be fixed?

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e177dccd-caea-46b9-bdbb-d3f4e88bfc84)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/91b7556d-d795-4e3d-8396-3b81cda2770d)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate performance issues in Pieces OS and VS Code extension, especially after multiple Copilot messages. Focus on high resource usage and UI slowdowns.
Address the inability to update last week's activities in the Workstream feature on macOS.
Prioritize resolving issues affecting Windows (OS version 12.0.0) and macOS (OS version 4.2.1) users.
